content: Attributes and tags on instances are now stored more efficiently, decreasing memory pressure.
Adds support for LR and ISR metrics on the **Network Stats** diagnostic.
In Luau's New Type Solver, improve instantiation of generics by allowing unions and intersections to be in their bounds.
In Luau's New Type Solver, clarify the error message when a valid instantiation for a generic could not be inferred.
Adds autocomplete support for Luau function attributes.
Adds support for occlusion culling lights.
In Luau's New Type Solver, non strict mode will no longer issue warnings for usages of unreduced type functions.
In Luau's New Type Solver, fixes a bug where arguments to a function may not be inferred correctly when using a function with several optional arguments.
In Luau's New Type Solver, aligns the behavior of type checking property access on the `table` type between if-else statements and if-else expressions.
Very large commands no longer save to the command bar history.
Fixes collisions with very small triangle meshes with sizes less than 0.05.

Fixes an issue where having many `Class.Sound|Sounds`, `Class.SoundGroup|SoundGroups`, `Class.AudioPlayer|AudioPlayers`, `Class.AudioAnalyzer|AudioAnalyzers`, or `Class.AudioTextToSpeech` could cause `Sound:Stop()` to be very slow.
Smooth-skinned avatars no longer have seams at part boundaries when undergoing deformation by `Class.WrapDeformer|WrapDeformers`.
Fixes an issue where `typeof` with a vector value known at compile time would incorrectly return "vector" instead of "Vector3".
Improves type-checking and autocomplete when using ObjectValues in `require`.
Autocomplete correctly makes suggestions in unfinished `repeat` blocks when typing at the end of the file.
Fixes a case where another gamepad can't control the player after the first gamepad was disconnected on Xbox.
